query.statement:
SELECT CONSL_NO -- 상당번호 ,CONSL_DATE -- 상담날짜 ,CALL_TNO -- 전화번호 ,CALL_TYPE_CD -- 통화유형 ,REG_DT -- 등록일시 ,CHG_DT -- 수정일시 ,ACPT_NO -- 고장접수번호 ,ACPT_DATE -- 접수일자 ,ACPT_TIME -- 접수시간 ,HCSADM.UF_SYSDATE(ACPT_DATE||ACPT_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS',0) AS ACPT_DATETIME -- 접수일시 ,INTG_PRJ_NO -- 통합프로젝트번호 ,DEAL_LINE_DIV -- 거래선 ,PRJ_NO -- 원프로젝트 번호 ,HO_NO -- 호기 ,CONSL_LCD -- 접수유형(대)코드 ,FN_CODEBOOK('CONSL_CD', CONSL_LCD) AS CONSL_LCD_NM -- 접수유형(대)명 ,CONSL_MCD -- 접수유형(중)코드 ,FN_CODEBOOK('CONSL_CD', CONSL_MCD) AS CONSL_MCD_NM -- 접수유형(중)명 ,CONSL_SCD -- 접수유형(소)코드 ,FN_CODEBOOK('CONSL_CD', CONSL_SCD) AS CONSL_SCD_NM -- 접수유형(소)명 ,PROC_TC -- 고장처리구분 ,VALUE(ACPT_CNTN,'') AS ACPT_CNTN -- 접수내용 ,VALUE(BKDN_FLOR_LCD,'') AS BKDN_FLOR_LCD -- 고장층1 ,VALUE(BKDN_FLOR_SCD,'') AS BKDN_FLOR_SCD -- 고장층2 ,VIR_PRJ_YN -- 가프로젝트 ,PROC_EGNR_USER_ID -- 처리기사ID ,HCSADM.FN_USER(PROC_EGNR_USER_ID,'') AS PROC_EGNR_USER_NM -- 처리기사명 ,VALUE(FIN_DATE||FIN_TIME,'') AS FIN_DATETIME -- 완료일시 ,PROC_STAT_CD -- 처리상태 ,VALUE(HCSADM.FN_CODEBOOK('040000',BKDN_LOC_LCD),'') AS BKDN_LOC_LCD -- 고장부위(대) ,VALUE(HCSADM.FN_CODEBOOK('040000',BKDN_LOC_CD),'') AS BKDN_LOC_CD -- 고장부위(중) ,VALUE(HCSADM.FN_CODEBOOK('020000',BKDN_CAU_CD),'') AS BKDN_CAU_CD -- 고장원인 ,VALUE(PROC_RSLT_CD ,'') AS PROC_RSLT_CD -- 처리결과 ,LTRIM(RTRIM(PRJ_NM)) AS PRJ_NM -- 프로젝트 명 ,REPR_PTNR_CD -- 협력사 ,PTNR_NM -- 협력사 명 ,REPR_AREA -- 지역 ,HCSADM.FN_CODEBOOK('CST115',REPR_AREA) AS REPR_AREA_NM -- 지역명 ,HO_NM -- 호기명 ,BUD_CO_NM -- 계약업체명 ,REPR_UDTK_DATE -- 보수인수일 ,HCSADM.FN_USER(REPR_PM_EMP_NO,'') AS REPR_PM_EMP_NM -- 보수PM FROM ( SELECT A.* ,B.BUD_CO_NM ,B.PRJ_NM ,B1.HO_NM ,B1.REPR_AREA ,B1.REPR_PTNR_CD ,B1.REPR_UDTK_DATE ,B1.ALNC_YN ,B1.INSTL_PTNR_NM ,B1.INSTL_TEAM_MNG_NM ,B1.REPR_PM_EMP_NO ,RPT.BKDN_LOC_LCD ,RPT.BKDN_LOC_CD ,RPT.BKDN_CAU_CD ,RPT.PROC_RSLT_CD ,PT.PTNR_NM FROM ( SELECT CHIST.CONSL_NO ,CHIST.CONSL_DATE ,CHIST.CALL_TNO ,CHIST.CALL_TYPE_CD ,CHIST.REG_DT ,CHIST.CHG_DT ,BASE.ACPT_NO ,BASE.ACPT_DATE ,BASE.ACPT_TIME ,BASE.INTG_PRJ_NO ,BASE.DEAL_LINE_DIV ,BASE.PRJ_NO ,BASE.HO_NO ,BASE.CONSL_LCD ,BASE.CONSL_MCD ,BASE.CONSL_SCD ,BASE.PROC_TC ,BASE.ACPT_CNTN ,BASE.BKDN_FLOR_LCD ,BASE.BKDN_FLOR_SCD ,BASE.VIR_PRJ_YN ,BASE.DUP_YN ,HIST.PROC_EGNR_USER_ID ,HIST.FIN_DATE ,HIST.FIN_TIME ,HIST.PROC_STAT_CD FROM HCSADM.UC_ASS_BASE AS BASE LEFT OUTER JOIN HCSADM.UC_ASS_PROC_HIST AS HIST ON BASE.ACPT_NO=HIST.ACPT_NO AND HIST.PROC_STAT_CD != '21007' ,HCSADM.UC_CRS_CONSL_HIST AS CHIST WHERE BASE.CONSL_NO = CHIST.CONSL_NO AND CHIST.CALL_TYPE_CD IN ('INBOUND','MANUAL')
AND BASE.ACPT_DATE BETWEEN #REC_FMD# AND #REC_TOD# -- 접수기간
AND BASE.CONSL_LCD = #GBN# -- 고장접수 유형
AND BASE.INTG_PRJ_NO = #UPN# -- 통합프로젝트
AND BASE.DEAL_LINE_DIV = #CST# -- 거래선
UNION ALL
SELECT HIST.CONSL_NO ,HIST.CONSL_DATE ,HIST.CALL_TNO ,HIST.CALL_TYPE_CD ,HIST.REG_DT ,HIST.CHG_DT ,DTL.CONSL_DTL_SEQ AS ACPT_NO ,HIST.CONSL_DATE AS ACPT_DATE ,SUBSTR(DTL.REG_DT,9,6) AS ACPT_TIME ,DTL.INTG_PRJ_NO ,DTL.DEAL_LINE_DIV ,DTL.PRJ_NO ,DTL.HO_NO ,DTL.CONSL_LCD ,DTL.CONSL_MCD ,DTL.CONSL_SCD ,'' AS PROC_TC ,DTL.NQRY_CNTN AS ACPT_CNTN ,'' AS BKDN_FLOR_LCD ,'' AS BKDN_FLOR_SCD ,'' AS VIR_PRJ_YN ,'' AS DUP_YN ,'' AS PROC_EGNR_USER_ID ,'' AS FIN_DATE ,'' AS FIN_TIME ,'' AS PROC_STAT_CD FROM HCSADM.UC_CRS_CONSL_DTL AS DTL ,HCSADM.UC_CRS_CONSL_HIST AS HIST WHERE DTL.CONSL_NO=HIST.CONSL_NO AND HIST.CALL_TYPE_CD IN ('INBOUND','MANUAL')
AND HIST.CONSL_DATE BETWEEN #REC_FMD# AND #REC_TOD# -- 접수기간
AND DTL.CONSL_LCD = #GBN# -- 고장접수 유형
AND DTL.INTG_PRJ_NO = #UPN# -- 통합프로젝트
AND DTL.DEAL_LINE_DIV = #CST# -- 거래선
) AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN HCSADM.SAP_PRJ_INFO AS B ON A.INTG_PRJ_NO=B.PRJ_NO AND A.DEAL_LINE_DIV=B.DEAL_LINE_DIV LEFT OUTER JOIN HCSADM.SAP_HO_INFO AS B1 ON A.INTG_PRJ_NO=B1.INTG_PRJ_NO AND A.DEAL_LINE_DIV=B1.DEAL_LINE_DIV AND A.PRJ_NO=B1.PRJ_NO AND A.HO_NO=B1.HO_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN HCSADM.UC_ASS_FIN_RPT AS RPT ON A.ACPT_NO=RPT.ACPT_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN HCSADM.SAP_PTNR AS PT ON B1.REPR_PTNR_CD=PT.PTNR_CD WHERE 1=1
AND B1.REPR_AREA = #ARA# -- 대지역
AND B1.REPR_PTNR_CD = #BSU# -- 협력사
AND B1.REPR_PM_EMP_NO = #BPM# -- 보수PM
AND RPT.BKDN_CAU_CD = #RSN# -- 고장원인
) A2 FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
